snippet: Per Blankens, who spent five years at the helm of the Swedish version of “Idol,” will be among the people charged with reviving the American version.
abstract: FremantleMedia North America says it has chosen Pers Blankens as new executive producer for television singing competition American Idol; news comes after reports that longtime producers Nigel Lythgoe and Ken Warwick have been dismissed.
lead_paragraph: Per Blankens, who spent five years at the helm of the Swedish version of “Idol,” will be among the people charged with reviving the American version.

headline.main: New Executive Producer Named for ‘American Idol’
